group.label: Alternative Payment Methods
group.comment: Set up alternative payment methods to accept online and in-app payments without cards. These methods include bank transfers, direct debit, e-wallets, mobile payments, and lets you support the local payment methods that are popular in your shopper's regions.

field.label: Ratepay Device Ident SId
field.tooltip: Your unique Ratepay ID provided by a Ratepay integration consultant.

field.label: Gift card refunds
field.tooltip: For gift cards, you can configure how to process refunds for cases where a part of the payment was completed with another payment method.]> Adyen\Payment\Model\Config\Source\PartialPaymentRefundStrategy payment/adyen_abstract/partial_payments_refund_strategy If you support partial payments with gift cards, you can select how to process refunds.

field.label: ISO Country Code (optional)
field.tooltip: This will override the shopper billing address country when determining what payment methods to display.

field.label: Language locale (optional)
field.tooltip: This will override the default shopper locale of the Magento store (e.g. nl_NL). Leave empty to let Magento decide.

field.label: Boleto additional days for delivery
field.tooltip: The number of days to be added to the current date to set the delivery date.
